Name: Prune Face
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: POUR bourbon into a glass with four ice cubes and STIR until ice has at least half melted. Add other ingredients and additional ice and stir some more.
Review: Why muddle cherries into your Old Fashioned when you can add a hint of prune?
History: Created in 2002 by Dan Warner at Zander, London, England and named after our friend's nickname for his stepmother.
Nutrition: One serving of Prune Face contains 251 calories
